summary: Replaces the sound effect of Whirlwind Sprint, NOT the vocal parts of the shout.
descriptionHtml:
This is a (very) small sound mod that replaces the sound effect of the Whirlwind Sprint shout.

I got tired of hearing that annoying, nonsensical squeaking in the default sound effect, so I decided to do something about it. While editing the squeaks out, I decided to give the sound a little bit more depth, subtly mixing in new thunderclap sounds. The result is a highly vanilla-esque sound, but without the annoying squeaks and a little more "boominess".

I've included a short comparison video, so you can hear the difference yourself. In my experience, I've found that the new sound makes the shout much more usable without that irksome squeaking.

Note: This only replaces the shout's single sound effect, NOT the actual vocal part(s) of the shout. Those remain unchanged.
author: ReconditeArcanaTMG
